markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Occult Librarian](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=235)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 29 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

Hours spent reading numerous compendiums dedicated to various occult topics honed your knowledge of these more obscure magical arts. You might have taken to adventuring to finance your acquisition of rare tomes, to explore occult mysteries that can't be found in the pages of a book, or perhaps to put your skills to the test.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) skill, and the [Academia Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Schooled in Secrets](/Feats.aspx?ID=2148) skill feat.
name: Occult Librarian

text: Occult Librarian Source Secrets of Magic pg. 29 2.0 Hours spent reading numerous compendiums dedicated to various occult topics honed your knowledge of these more obscure magical arts. You might have taken to adventuring to finance your acquisition of rare tomes, to explore occult mysteries that can't be found in the pages of a book, or perhaps to put your skills to the test. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Intelligence or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Occultism skill, and the Academia Lore skill. You gain the Schooled in Secrets skill feat.
